name:
Mario vs. Donkey Kong™
Tipping Stars
formal_name:
Mario vs. Donkey Kong™
Tipping Stars
description:
You get a free download code for Mario vs. Donkey Kong™ Tipping Stars for Wii U with this purchase. The download code for the content can be found on-screen after the purchase and can also be found on the receipt including information on how to redeem it later.

Uh-oh! Donkey Kong’s kidnapped Pauline, and only Mario can rescue her in puzzler Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars! Guide mini, clockwork versions of Mario and friends to the exits in over 60 increasingly-fiendish 2D puzzle stages!

Build and share your own levels, or download new ones from other players. If you find a stage you like, you can even tip the creator with stars, giving them the chance to build even better stages in the future!

Please note: due to differences in hardware, in some rare instances, user-created levels may not be playable on both versions of the game.
